meanings.definition: A rare hydrated cerium fluocarbonate mineral with formula Mn₂Ce(CO₃)(OH)₄F.
meanings.english_definition: A rare hydrated cerium fluocarbonate mineral with formula Mn₂Ce(CO₃)(OH)₄F.

etymology.value: Named after Anders Jahan Retzius (1742–1821), a Swedish chemist, botanist and naturalist.
